text: Chandarlapadu is a village in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Chandarlapadu mandal of Vijayawada revenue division. It is one of the villages in the mandal to be a part of Andhra Pradesh Capital Region. == See also == *Villages in Chandarlapadu mandal == References == Category:Villages in Krishna district Category:Mandal headquarters in Krishna district
title: Chandarlapadu
